department: Public Works and Government Services ( TPSC)
short_summary: Refit fall 2022 CCGS Pierre Radisson. The requirement is: a) to carry out the ship repair work regarding the Canadian Coast Guard Ship CCGS Pierre Radisson during the 2022 fall layout in Quebec City Quebec
description: The requirement is: a) to carry out the ship repair work regarding the Canadian Coast Guard Ship CCGS Pierre Radisson during the 2022 fall layout in Quebec City Quebec in accordance with the Technical Specifications attached as Annex A and all related drawings. b) to carry out any approved unscheduled work not covered in paragraph a) above.
